basics.name: Liza Oneill
basics.label: Digital Innovator & Creative Media Strategist with over 10 years of experience in pioneering content and driving audience engagement.
basics.summary: Pioneering new strategies and content to push the boundaries of the digital media landscape. Passionate about creating engaging experiences that captivate audiences and drive innovation.

work.summary: Overseeing the digital innovation department, driving forward-thinking initiatives to maintain the company's leadership in the tech industry.
highlights: Launched a groundbreaking AI-powered content creation tool, reducing production time by 30%.
Established a digital transformation roadmap, positioning the company as a leader in tech innovation.
Increased digital campaign effectiveness by 40% through strategic use of data analytics.

work.summary: Crafted and executed digital strategies to enhance online presence and audience engagement for high-profile clients.
highlights: Increased client social media following by 200% through targeted content campaigns.
Implemented data-driven approaches to optimize content performance and ROI.
Led a team of 10 digital strategists in developing comprehensive media plans for diverse industries.

work.summary: Directed the innovation team to explore and implement new digital media technologies and content strategies.
highlights: Spearheaded the development of a new interactive media platform that attracted 1 million users in its first year.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate emerging technologies like AR and VR into media content.
Won the 'Best Digital Innovation' award at the 2017 Media Excellence Awards.

work.summary: Led the creation and implementation of cutting-edge digital media strategies, driving the company's vision and growth.
highlights: Founded the company, establishing its presence in the competitive digital media market.
Developed innovative content strategies that increased audience engagement by 50%.
Secured partnerships with leading tech companies to enhance media distribution channels.

projects.name: Media Platform
projects.description: Developed an interactive media platform that revolutionized audience engagement.
highlights: Attracted 1 million users in the first year

projects.name: AI Content Tool
projects.description: Launched an AI-powered tool that streamlined content creation.

projects.name: Transformation Roadmap
projects.description: Developed a digital transformation roadmap for Tech Pioneers.

projects.name: AR/VR Integration
projects.description: Integrated AR and VR technologies into NextGen Media's content.
highlights: Expanded media offerings with immersive content

projects.name: Social Growth
projects.description: Led a social media campaign that significantly increased client followings.

projects.name: Astro Framework Project
projects.description: Utilized Astro framework and Tailwind CSS to create a dynamic web project.

projects.name: Ghostwriting Initiative
projects.description: Provided ghostwriting services for high-profile clients.

projects.name: SEO Optimization Project
projects.description: Led an SEO optimization project to improve search engine rankings.
highlights: Enhanced site visibility on search engines

projects.name: CSV Data Analysis Tool
projects.description: Developed a tool for analyzing CSV data to extract valuable insights.
